channel.title: Free Transport Tycoon Game - AKA OpenTDD
channel.description:
Free Transport Tycoon Game - AKA OpenTDD
http://www.openttd.org/
This game is like a Sim City game only it's free and easy to use with many features! Here are a few screenshots. http://www.openttd.org/screens.php
Last update was May 19, 2007 so it's still being updated regularly. Enjoy!

item.title: Free Transport Tycoon Game - AKA OpenTDD
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

its this portable?

meaning can I put on an external and carry it around? or is it a gay piece of shit that writes to the registry (FUCK U EA!!!)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 09:22:35 AM[/size][hr]nvm. i found that on forums it has a .reg file in the folder u can use, so u dont need to install the game to register the shit

thank god…

item.title: Free Transport Tycoon Game - AKA OpenTDD
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh sorry guys, I forgot to mention that. It says it on the download page.

OpenTTD requires the original version of Transport Tycoon Deluxe data files in order to function. Please refer to the readme for more information.

So just get the torrent.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Transport Tycoon Game - AKA OpenTDD
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

TheBeanie:

Says Sample.cat is missing or corrupt… tried redownloading and nothing.

I had that same problem. I think you have to actually own (or download) the Transport Tycoon Deluxe game.

http://www.demonoid.com/files/details/1030830/1320578/
Torrent. Its 8MB, but has only 9 seeders. It should only take a few minutes though.
